testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
When I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
And I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
And Question Designer is opened(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
When I enter valid information for the question name as "TA-8726 question"(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
And I click inside the question text editor(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
When I choose "Mathematical Formula" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
And I click OK(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
Then I see the "Mathematical Formula" Question Widget in the question text section(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
And I click the question designer Save & Close button(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
When I choose creating new assignment in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
Then Assignment Editor is opened(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
When enter Assignment name "TA-8726 Assignment A"(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
And I click on the questions tab(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
And I click the import question button(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
Then The import questions dialog appears(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
When I click on "Questions"(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
And I select the question "TA-8726 question"(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
And I click Import Questions in the Import Questions dialog(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
Then verify the question caption text is "TA-8726 question"(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
When I save & close the assignment on the questions page(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
Then I see summary of the assignment(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
When I save and close the assignment summary details(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
Then the new assignment "TA-8726 Assignment A" is visible in its own expanded column(Scenario: Ensure gradebook shows proper assignment's question scores
